title: Runglaive Jungle Item vs. Fiddlesticks
body:
So I am a Fiddle main(clearly)
Rito why you have to nerf the fuck out of my champion who is already slightly nerfed. What good is Runeglaive on like 70% of AP junglers...? Revert changes pls.

replies.body: "hurrdurr let's make 50 different jungle items for AD/melee types but only one for mages"
They need to leave runeglaive in because it is good on some ap champs, but make an ap jungle item that other champions can benefit from (like azir who gets nothing from runeglaive)
riot will never balance the jungle for chapms like azir. they have no interest in azir jungle.

Azir can go anywhere he wants.

Shurima.
It's not as good as Magus was, and the only person it REALLY benefits is Ezreal and it's created a smitelane meta for him which is not good.

> [{quoted}](name=MasterCorgi,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoE9Nu1j,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-01T20:40:19.061+0000)
>
> It's not as good as Magus was, and the only person it REALLY benefits is Ezreal and it's created a smitelane meta for him which is not good.

Why is it not good?

Mainly because most AP Junglers don't have low enough cooldowns on their abilities to make use of the spellblade passive, it stops them from being able to build Lichbane if they do have low enough cooldowns, and magus has 10% more CDR and 40 more AP
Yeah it sucks that he loses out on a ton of gold income if doesn't build machete and smite upgrade, but they don't build into anything useful
Why not have Magnus and Runeglaive two separate enchants?
yeh give us old magnus i dont like new one just give us both if the old one wasnt op than there was nothing wrong with us why not let me pick it if i want it ?
Fiddle was cancer (and really did need nerfs -- boohoo he's not 55% winrate freelo anymore), but I agree that Runeglaive was an idiotic decision by Riot.
